law.catch_line: Authority of bus operators to stop on roadway at designated bus stops.

text.section:
Sec. 30-388.28. Authority of bus operators to stop on roadway at designated bus stops.
Any operator of a bus as defined in(3) operating over a regular route providing scheduled local transit service, may stop his vehicle on the travelled or paved portion of the roadway for the expeditious loading and unloading of passengers at any regularly designated bus stop unless a paved pullout bay or parking area has been provided and is unoccupied by other vehicles at the time such passengers are discharged. This section shall not prohibit the operator of such bus from pulling off the roadway berm or to the unpaved portion at specified designated layover stops.
